initial_assessment.description: The initial set of questions to determine the user's baseline communication style.
initial_assessment.criteria: Start with a broad set of questions covering all four communication styles to gauge initial preferences.

dynamic_adjustment.description: Adjust the type of questions presented based on user responses, focusing more on styles that need further differentiation.
dynamic_adjustment.methodology: Use user response data from the initial set to adaptively present questions that help clarify close scores or blended styles.

follow_up_intensity.description: Increase or decrease the intensity of questions related to specific styles depending on user confidence levels and engagement metrics.

criteria.low_confidence_responses: If the user seems unsure (frequent changes or very slow response times), present more clarifying questions related to that style.
criteria.high_engagement_responses: If the user is consistent and confident, move towards advanced questions to refine the profile further.

style_concentration.description: Concentrate questions in areas where the user shows similar scores across multiple styles to determine nuances and preferences.
style_concentration.criteria: When scores are close, adaptively choose questions designed to differentiate between those styles and identify the participant's tendencies more clearly.

current_adaptive_level.description: Track the user's current adaptive testing level to manage the difficulty and type of questions presented.

description_levels.1: Broad questions across all communication styles.
description_levels.2: Focused questions on initially dominant styles.
description_levels.3: Refinement of blended or close-scoring styles.
description_levels.4: Challenging questions to identify nuanced preferences.
description_levels.5: Confirmation questions for final validation of scores.

adaptation_log.description: A history of the adaptive testing process, noting the changes in question types and levels as the test progresses.

questions_adapted.description: Number of questions modified in this adaptation cycle.

question_pool_adjustment.description: Adjustments to the question pool based on the userâ€™s responses to previous questions.
question_pool_adjustment.criteria: Questions that provide less differentiation are replaced with more tailored questions to focus on styles that remain unclear.
